Corinne Sophia Baumgartner is a 70 year old retired VP of Exploration from Switzerland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Corinne Sophia Baumgartner is currently widowed. Her children are named Nina, Noemi and Wyss.
Education Background:
Corinne received her secondary school diploma from Liceo scientifico Giovanni Polli Lugano in 1973.
After that, she went on to study at University of Fribourg until 1977.
Occupation History:
Corinne Sophia Baumgartner is a 70 year old retired VP of Exploration from Switzerland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 1978, Corinne Sophia Baumgartner started working as a Drilling Engineer at Varo Energy AG, marking the beginning of her successful career.
Her subsequent role was as a Reservoir Engineer at Varo Energy AG, where she continued to grow professionally from 1982 to 1986.
At Petrolift AG, she worked as a Operations Manager from 1986 to 1988, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
She appointment as a VP of Exploration at Varo Energy AG in 1988 marked a significant milestone in her career, as she took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 2690000 CHF.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Lausanne and Chur, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
